metadata.title: CVE-2024-29161 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: HDF5 through 1.14.3 contains a heap buffer overflow inH5A__attr_release_table, resulting in the corruption of the instructionpointer and causing denial of service or potential code execution.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
